title: Ticket #5827: Document possible use of DAG INCLUDE to simplify multiple similar DAGs
description:
(I'm not sure whether this should go in the Wiki or the actual manual.)

Anyhow, I was just talking with Christina about a user who wants some kind of template capability for specifying multiple similar DAGs, and we brainstormed the possibility of something like this: 

  # file: run57.dag
  INCLUDE structure.dag
  INCLUDE vars57.dag


  # file structure.dag
  JOB split ...
  JOB process00 ...
  ...
  JOB process99 ...
  JOB combine


  # vars57.dag
  VARS split file="input57"
  VARS process00 file="intermediate57"
  ...
  VARS combine file="output57"

The idea is that structure.dag could get re-used for all of your runs; you'd only have to change runXX.dag and varsXX.dag.

This could get simplified even more once the "for all nodes" VARS feature is implemented (#5729).
